- The chinchilla is named Lucy

- Rule3 (preferred): Dinosaur neglects dragon if its name starts with same letter as chinchilla's name

- This means Luna neglects the dragon

Consequently, <quote>Rule1: One of the rules of the game is that if the dinosaur neglects the dragon, then the dragon will, without hesitation, hug the husky</quote> is triggered, mandating the dragon's action of hugging the husky.
